description.narrative: Sierra Leone Threshold - Water Sector Reform Project: The project is comprised of three activities that support government reform efforts to water sector institutions, test improved business practices, reduce water loss, and pilot a public-private partnership model for public standpipes.

title.narrative: Value disbursed of water and sanitation technical assistance contracts

description.narrative: Cumulative Process of The amount disbursed of all signed technical assistance contracts, including resettlement action plans, for water and sanitation investments using Threshold Program funds,

title.narrative: Percent disbursed of water and sanitation technical assistance contracts
